attributes.action: implement the use of criminal record checks -crb checks- for all those who work with children in waltham forest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been noted by the Government Watchdog -the Commission for Social Care Inspection- that the London Borough of Waltham Forest does not carry out crb checks on all employees who work with children, and/or does not hold all information on these checks if they had been carried out.  

Waltham Forest are currently placing our children into 'risk' by not vetting these individuals properly, in order to save their costs.

I would therefore urge you to petition with me in order to safe-guard our children against such unfortunate incidents, as of that in Soham a few years ago.
